meanings.sent1: The rubiest gem in the collection sparkled the brightest.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was the rubiest at the party, catching everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The rubiest flower in the garden seemed to glow in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The rubiest sunset painted the sky with vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The rubiest lipstick she wore made her smile even more radiant.

meanings.definition: Most red or pink in color.
meanings.sent1: The rubiest rose in the bouquet stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent2: The sky turned the rubiest shade as the sun began to set.
meanings.sent3: His cheeks turned rubiest when he realized his mistake.
meanings.sent4: The rubiest paint on the canvas brought the whole artwork to life.
meanings.sent5: The rubiest strawberry in the basket looked the most delicious.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities of a ruby gemstone.
meanings.sent1: The rubiest necklace she wore was a family heirloom.
meanings.sent2: The rubiest ring sparkled on her finger in the candlelight.
meanings.sent3: His eyes had a rubiest glint when he talked about his passion.
meanings.sent4: The rubiest personality shone through in her kind gestures.
meanings.sent5: The rubiest crystal in the chandelier cast colorful reflections around the room.
